data.title: USD to MUR: Convert US Dollars to Mauritius Rupees
data.meta_description: Use the USD to MUR currency converter at Exchange-Rates.org for accurate and up-to-date exchange rates. Easily convert US Dollars to Mauritius Rupees with real-time data.
data.text:
Frequently Asked Question about USD to MUR

How much is 1 US Dollar in Mauritius Rupees?

1 US Dollar = 46.270 Mauritius Rupees as of August 19, 2024 07:30 AM UTC. You can get live exchange rates between US Dollars and Mauritius Rupees using exchange-rates.org, which aggregates real-time forex data from the most authoritative sources.

How much is 100 US Dollars in Mauritius Rupees?

As of August 19, 2024 07:30 AM UTC, 100 US Dollars is equivalent to 4,627.00 Mauritius Rupees. The exchange rate at this time is 46.270 Mauritius Rupees per US Dollar.

What was the highest USD to MUR exchange rate in the last 10 years?

In the last 10 years, the highest rate from US Dollars to Mauritius Rupees was on April 15, 2024 when each US Dollar was worth 47.750 Mauritius Rupees.

When is the best time to convert USD to MUR?

The USD and MUR can be traded 24x5, starting from the time markets open on Monday mornings in Sydney until they close on Fridays at 5 PM in New York. Exchange rates can fluctuate by the minute while markets are open. However, the period between 3-4 PM GMT is often a good time to convert US Dollars to Mauritius Rupees because currency market liquidity and trading volume tend to be the highest during this time. Additionally, it's advisable to convert US Dollars to Mauritius Rupees early in the week if you need MUR urgently. Executing a trade late in the week might result in a delayed settlement until the following week, as forex markets are closed on weekends.

Which is stronger, the US Dollar or the Mauritius Rupee?

The US Dollar is currently stronger than the Mauritius Rupee, as 1 USD is equal to 46.270 MUR. Conversely, 1 MUR is worth 0.02161 USD.

Is the US Dollar up or down against the Mauritius Rupee?

The US Dollar has increased +4.45% year-to-date against the Mauritius Rupee. Over the past 10 years, the US Dollar has appreciated +45.73% against the Mauritius Rupee. Consequently, the US Dollar has gained purchasing power compared to the Mauritius Rupee over the last decade.

What's the best USD to MUR exchange rate today?

As of August 19, 2024 07:30 AM UTC, the best USD to MUR exchange rate is 46.270 MUR. This means that for every US Dollar you exchange, you will receive 46.270 Mauritius Rupees.
